Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory60.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "What's wrong, Father?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'I heard you have been giving away your food to others, Bianca...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'Here are some food, Bianca...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Father Snow, didn't you also give all your food to the children?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: "Th-that's not the same. I've already eaten.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Father, I have a question. What has God taught us?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'God taught us to...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'Be holy, righteous, loving, giving; to love the enemy, fast, pray; to walk in the light, to not be greedy, not to judge; to be sincere and to stay on the path.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Fasting.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Under God's and your teaching, I'm also a pious believer.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "All I have done is to obey God's teaching.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'Bianca... My children.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: "Now, if I'm not a pious Father...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'Am I qualified... as a parent...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'Eat, my children, my silly children.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Of course you are! You raised and taught me, Father... I understand.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: '...People are starting to gather around the Snow Plain Church in the Arctic north.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'People seek shelter, and no matter their beliefs...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'As long as they need help, we will help. That is also one of your teachings.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'How long has it been since Miyi went to town to get food? A few days?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "... It's been three days.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Father... Is there anything we can do?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'Pray... We can only pray to God.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'Let us pray... We can only pray that God will bless us in this faraway Snow Plain Church, to help the people...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'God loves the world, Bianca.', 4: '2'}
